diffdriver 0.1.1

    How_to_use_diffdriver

    Function reference

    All functions

    bmrSignature()
    Title
    convertbeta()
    Create parameter vector for regular model
    convertbeta_sig()
    Create parameter vector for signature model
    dd_EM_ordinary()
    Title
    dd_EM_update()
    Title
    dd_loglik()
    Title
    dd_squarEM()
    Title
    ddmcode()
    Add intercept, if have functtypecode, then code and move to the front.
    ddmodel()
    diffDriver model
    ddmodel_binary()
    diffDriver model only for binary phenotype.
    ddmodel_binary_simple()
    diffDriver model only for binary phenotype, assuming bmr the same across samples.
    ddmodel_fixb()
    diffDriver model with effect size for positional functional annotations fixed
    ddmprocess()
    For vars in qnvars, will plug in normal distributed values for missing values using a normal distribution with width of qnvarimpute[2] and a downshift of the mean by qnvarimpute[1] compared to distribution of all.
    ddmread()
    Read data
    ddmread_j()
    Global variable Totalnttype, Outputdir
    diffdriver()
    Detect the relationship between a specified phenotype and mutation
    diffdriver_reg()
    Run diffDriver given input files
    diffdriver_sig()
    Run diffDriver given input files
    dtcoldup()
    check if any column is duplicate, if yes, stop script Note this is a rough way (check sum)
    genebinom()
    gene level binomial test
    genefisher()
    gene level fisher's exact test
    genelr()
    gene level logistic regression
    get_ll_s()
    Title
    get_pi()
    get pi
    hotspotseq()
    Generate the hotspot sequence
    matrixlistToBMR()
    Title
    matrixlistToGLM()
    Functional mutation
    matrixlistToGLM_sig()
    Compute the bmr
    mlcoluniq()
    check if all column in one dt has at least two values, if not, stop script check if all column in different lists have the same set of unique values
    mlr()
    gene level multiple linear regression
    mlr.v2()
    gene level multiple linear regression, correcting for total number of mutations
    plot_mut()
    plot mutations
    q_pos()
    Title
    readmodeldata()
    Read into data
    splitddm()
    divide matrixlist into groups defined in cpgenelist, if not in any group in cpggenelist, it is put in the last group. need to optimize almost hit 20G
